field.state.description: The processing status of the document

field.stateProcessing.description: The document is currently being processed

field.stateCompleted.description: The document has been processed successfully

message.introductionForKnowledge.message: Documents can be added to the knowledge base, allowing the bot to use knowledge from it when replying.
message.introductionForKnowledge.description: Introduction information for the knowledge base

message.introductionForRepository.message: The knowledge base is a collection of documents, where you can add documents. The bot will respond using the documents in the knowledge base.
message.introductionForRepository.description: Introduction information for the knowledge base

message.uploadDocumentsExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded documents exceeds the limit

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when document upload fails

message.uploadDocumentsSuccess.description: Success message when documents are uploaded successfully

message.startCreateDocument.description: Information when starting to process a document

message.startNewChat.description: Information when starting a new conversation

message.errorApiError.message: Response failed, please try again later

message.errorBadRequest.message: Request format is incorrect, please ask again
message.errorBadRequest.description: Error message when the request format is incorrect

message.errorNoConversation.message: Conversation not found or expired, please start a new conversation

message.errorContentTooLarge.message: Question content too long, please shorten and retry
message.errorContentTooLarge.description: Error message when the question content is too long

message.errorTooManyRequests.message: Your actions are too frequent, please try again later
message.errorTooManyRequests.description: Error message when actions are too frequent

message.errorUsedUp.message: You have reached the limit of your plan, please purchase more usage to continue
message.errorUsedUp.description: Error message when the usage limit of the plan is reached

message.errorUnknown.message: An unknown server error occurred, please try again later or contact support

message.errorTimeout.message: Question response timeout, please try again later
message.errorTimeout.description: Error message when the question response times out

message.errorNotApplied.message: You have not applied for this service, please apply before proceeding
message.errorNotApplied.description: Error message when the user has not applied for the service

message.howToUse.message: Press Shift+Enter to create a new line
message.howToUse.description: Information on how to create a new line

message.createRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when the knowledge base is created successfully
